mil7.7.2:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘thanassitadārakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.7.2:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, thanassitadārako sadatthe laggati, khīratthiko rodati;
mil7.7.2:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sadatthe laggitabbaṁ, sabbattha dhammañāṇena bhavitabbaṁ, uddese paripucchāya sammappayoge paviveke garusaṁvāse kalyāṇamittasevane.
mil7.7.2:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, thanassitadārakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.7.2:1.5: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena dīghanikāyavare parinibbānasuttante—
mil7.7.2:2.1: ‘Iṅgha tumhe, ānanda, sāratthe ghaṭatha, sāratthe anuyuñjatha, sāratthe appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathā’”ti.
